name: Temporary Network Fix
description: Rebooted the affected network switch to restore connectivity.

name: Application Restart
description: Restarted the application service to resolve the error.

name: DNS Flush
description: Flushed the DNS cache on the affected machine.

name: Rollback Configuration
description: Reverted to the previous configuration to resolve the issue.

name: Service Account Reset
description: Reset the password for the service account.

name: Patch Application
description: Applied a temporary patch to address the vulnerability.

name: Increase Timeout Value
description: Increased the timeout value for the affected service.

name: Restart Web Server
description: Performed a graceful restart of the web server.

name: Clear Cache
description: Cleared the application's internal cache.

name: Disable Feature
description: Temporarily disabled a problematic feature.

name: Manual Trade Execution
description: Traders are manually executing trades due to system issues.

name: Reverted to Previous Reporting
description: Financial reporting team has reverted to the previous day's report generation system.

name: Processed Payments in Batch
description: Payment operations processed pending payments in a manual batch due to gateway issues.

name: Temporary Risk Calculation Script
description: Risk team implemented a temporary script to calculate overnight risk exposure.

name: Customer Verification Override
description: Customer service agents are temporarily overriding the automated verification process for urgent cases.

name: ATM Cash Withdrawal Limit Reduced
description: ATM network operations temporarily reduced the daily withdrawal limit.

name: Manual Reconciliation
description: Settlements team is performing manual reconciliation of transaction data.

name: Disabled Mobile Deposit Feature
description: Digital banking team temporarily disabled the mobile check deposit feature.

name: Alerts Manually Monitored
description: Fraud detection system alerts are being manually reviewed by the security team.

name: Rolled Back Trading Algorithm
description: Front office trading rolled back the latest trading algorithm due to performance issues.

name: Manual Payroll Adjustment
description: Payroll team manually adjusted the salary for the affected employee.

name: Password Reset via Admin
description: IT helpdesk manually reset the employee portal password for the user.

name: Temporary Access Granted
description: Temporary read access granted to the HR documents share for the new hire.

name: Time Entry Approved Manually
description: HR administrator manually approved the time entry for the employee.

name: Application Restarted
description: IT support restarted the Recruitment Application Server to resolve the error.

name: Benefits Enrollment Form Provided Manually
description: HR provided a manual benefits enrollment form to the employee.

name: Report Generated from Backup
description: HR analytics team generated the required report from a backup of the reporting server.

name: Email Forwarding Enabled
description: IT enabled temporary email forwarding for the HR department's shared account.

name: Laptop Replaced Temporarily
description: IT replaced the HR Manager's laptop with a temporary loaner.

name: Direct Database Update
description: A database administrator directly updated the payroll database to correct an error.
